name: calamint
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
any of several plants of the mint family, with small pink or purple flowers, some kinds of which are used as herbs in cooking: Calamint is a low-growing plant with a minty smell and lavender flowers. The popular Middle Eastern herb blend known as za'atar often includes calamint.
